__login.enterphone: Enter your cellphone number to receive an authentication code
__login.recievesms: You will receive an SMS message with a 5 digit number which you need to finish the account creation process
__login.disclaimer: Rent Match Buy Match uses a two step authentication for all our accounts. Your number will not be used for any other purpose other than to verify your account in order to ensure a safe experience for all our users.
__login.enterdigits: Enter the 5 digits you just received
__login.problemtext: If you haven't received a text message please check the number you provided and try again
__login.stillproblem: Still having problems creating an account? Contact support
